1.content:
You, TX47, look our through the glass window of the large deck on board the command ship. Despite it's huge size, it remained perfectly cloaked and hidden from the blue planet it loomed over: Earth. This 'Earth' seemed to be of key importance to the empire, but not only because of it's conditions but because of it's people. You were part of an alien race that once thrived throughout the galaxy. However, the loss of cloning facilities had diminshed your numbers and you were now looking for ways to keep the species alive.

Scientists had been monitering another race for many years now: the human race. They were a less adcance civilization but had big ambitions, much like your species had. It was no public secret of their discovery. For nearly 40 years, your race had monitered mankind and their behaviour. Infact, many of your race had grown acustom to their way of living, especially the teens. Their way of life had been picked up on satelite and radio waves, with tales of Eifel Towers, cold wars and Led Zeppelins often sweeping through the public. Many of the males had also taken a shine to human women, seeing them as beautiful and sexy. It was a good job you are a male on this mission then.

You are a bounty hunter and had been given a special captains grant by the king himself. Your race was a short 'gray' like one, with a large ovalish head and smaller body. Your skin was rough and thick, with a blue-grey colour to it. You wore light advance armour with a strange device in the middle. The scientists that briefed you said it was a human possession device: 'simply concertrate on the target human, hit the button and voila. Instant trojan horse'. You also carried a ray gun your back for protection. You were itching to go now, you enjoyed this job as it gave you a sense of adventure + you couldn't wait to try out one of these human women...if they were all their crack up to be.

You assembled with 3 other captains at the pods in bay. They would teleport you down to the planet below. The scientist rambled on about how important the mission was and how it should be taken seriously. Somehow, by the looks on your and the other 3 captains faces, none of them would. The machine then strated up and after a bright flash you were down on one of the planets countries. But which one?
1.title: The Beggining

11.content:
After the bright flash of light, you landed on a large rock. It stood with several others scattered across a large field. There were lights surounding the field, all from large tall structures which stood stories high. There was also a large lake further down the hill and many, many trees. 'Where am I?'. You thought to yourself. You scanned your PTA and the location pointed to a large human colony called 'New York'. You were standing in the district of 'central park'. "New York eh, this area has often been talked about back home". You said to yourself. You wanted to get a better look at this iconic human colony. You engaged the cloaking device on your wirst device and shot up into the air via your jetback. The city was indeed huge and spralling, hundreds of thousands of little lights lit up below you. In the distance, you could see a large statue of a lady holding a torch. You zoomed down to see its huge size, standing on an island in the middle of the river.

"Wow, these humans must have worked a few slaves to death to build this". You growled to yourself in admiration. But enough sight seeing, you had a mission to do. You needed to take human bodies and bring them back to the mothership. There were so many choices and you began thinking hard about who you wanted first, as you touched down on the shore and hit somewhere quiet. Eventually your mind was swayed towards a...
11.title: USA

111.content: You decide to go with a human male, you look at the options around new york. There was what you looked up in your PTA to be a homeless man, a cop, and a criminal like figure on the spot all of whom were male, you look at the tree of them and decide to possess.
111.title: Human Male

1111.content:
You decide on the homeless man as you need to be able to show that you put some effort into trying to collect human specimens. Besides, according to reports so far, these people have nothing expected of them and would be ignored if they act strangely. Locating the correct button on your device, you press and suddenly lose all feeling of your body. Initially you panic and nearly scream out in shock but then you realise you have simply been turned into a wispy mass of gray smoke. Marvelling at the wonders your kind has come up with, you glide through the air, entering what is apparently called the "nose" in the human language and land in a dark, dank area. It takes a while but already you can feel your consciousness spreading throughout the human's "body" and you feel it come under your control. A piece of covering flickers open and you are able to see through the human's "eyes". Although primitive compared to yours, it is a relief to be able to see the environment again and you lie on the ground in your borrowed body for a while, just enjoying the novel experience of controlling another organism.

After about ten minutes of gazing at the blue expanse and the tall durable constructs made by the humans, you use your newfound strength to get up on your host's "legs", stretching out your "limbs" and examine "yourself". "You" are now a middle aged male of average height among humans but a giant in comparison to your own species. "Your" hands and legs show signs of once being strong and healthy but seem to have eithered away over time, causing you to wonder about your host's background. Unfortunately you find youself with access to only the host's knowledge about the world and not his memories or personality. Shrugging with your new "shoulders", you realise that your host's clothing is far shabbier and dirtier than all the other humans walking about. Strangely enough, no one seems to care about how your host appears to look so different and has such poor coverings compared to theirs. Your host also has hair growing out of his face and although it seems to be fairly common as you look around, none of them have hair quite as long or tangled as yours.

Wondering what all of this could mean, you hear a man walk into the alley you are in, playing around with what seems to be a technological device and yet it has close to no buttons. Deciding a little reconaissance was in order, you walk over to him and...
1111.title: The homeless man

choices: Figure out what you can do
1112.content: You decide to posses the cop, from the description you read, they were the law enforcers. 'that would be good' you say to your self. You press that button on the possession device and are instantly turned into a liquid like substance. It wasn't what you were expecting, but you could work with it. You slide over to the cop and start to crawl up his back. he doesn't notice. once you get to his neck, you slide around to his mouth, and start to slide in. He starts choking on you and trying to spit you out, but its to late you are in control. you take a look at your new body and feel strength. 'this will be good you say....
1112.title: The Cop

112.content:
Your mind began to think about human females. They had often been discussed about on the homeworld, but there was only scattered information on them from old radio and tv signals the humans had blasted into space. Plus there was information exchanged with other aliens who had been to the planet for 'probeing'. Your race had never really needed contact with humanity, untill now that is. From what your friends on the homeworld had told you, they were mostly ment to be very attractive. One of your friends had once described human females as "one of the most beautiful species we have ever found". You wanted a candidate who you enjoyed. There were no specific requirements on this mission though, so long as you brought one back.

The humans seemed to have different power classes on this planet, much like on your homeworld. It started with the civilians, the common working class populace of the planet. This was the most widescale option, as they populated most corners of the planet. And your were certain there were plently of civilians in this 'U.S.A.'. Then there were the celebtites. These were less common but had more unique features than the civilains. This usuually elevated their social status. It was also the class where some of the most beautiful females were found. Then, above that, there were the politicans. They were the highest ranking humans on the planet because they made the laws that governed the civilian and celebrity populace. They were usually well guarded though, so getting to them wouldn't be that easy.

Your mind was eventually swung to a...
112.title: Human Female

choices: Undressing to take a shower, she is alone.
You move on to the next window.
1121.content:
You are invisible to the human eye, and high above the city of New York. As you eagerly look around for your first female specimen, you decide to try one of the civilian classes first, just to see what these humans are like, and in a mega city of several million humans, you don’t have to wait long. You look to your right, and see a tall building near by. The humans of this city might call this a skyscraper, or maybe it is an apartment complex, that’s several stories tall, your not sure. You growl as you move towards this building, seeing several large windows in front of you. You then see several lights on in this building, so you decide to randomly pick a window. As you look inside the first window of the sixth floor of this apartment complex, you see that the curtains are wide open. You then see what looks like a bed room before you, also, there is an adjoining bathroom next door, and its curtains are wide open too, but you see that nobody is home. Just then, the bedroom door opens, and in walks an incredibly beautiful creature.

…………………………………………….

As Kristina walks into her bedroom, she is unaware that she is in mortal danger, but before we go on, please let me describe her. At thirteen years old, Kristina has the body of a young playboy playmate. She stands 5’1, and she has long, curly lit brown hair that almost reaches down to her lovely ass. She has fair skin, and a slender figure, with curvy hips. She also has lit brown eyes, and size D breasts. She is intelligent, and a bit shy. She is a member of her middle schools gymnastics, and cheerleading teams. She is currently wearing a white tank top, and a pink mini skirt. Basically, she kind of looks like Sam from the American I-Carly TV show, only with bigger breasts.

……………………………………………….

As you watch her walking into the bedroom, she turns on some music. You then see her…
1121.title: A young teenage civillian from the USA.

choices: Step out of the shower and dress in something girls consider "cute"
Step out and dress in the first thing you find
11211.content:
You see her undress and climb into the restroom. Curious, you continue washing. "So that thing she took off must be like our armor...it's not attached to the body. But that would never protect her in a war."

As soon as she steps into the shower, you prepare yourself, and you launch yourself into her body. She fights it, and ends up slipping in the shower, knocking her unconcious, which made things much easier for you.

Once you gain full control, you get up and rub her, or your head. "Wow, that hurts..."

You stare at the oncoming water from the shower head, and realize this is what humans do to cleanse themselves. You study the objects around you and finally manage to shower her body.
11211.title: Undressing to take a shower, she is alone.

112111.content:
You stepped out of the shower and found a towel. After examining it, you wrapped it around yourself after drying yourself off, and walked into her bedroom and opened up her closet.

"Hmm..." you say. You pull out a device that scanned this girl's mind, and you instantly knew how to put on the appropriate attire. You took off the towel and put on a bra and pair of panties, and looked in the closet once more.

"This girl likes this, so I guess I'll wear it as well..."

You took out a green top and a denim skirt and slipped them on, and continued to scan this girl's mind to learn how to finish getting ready. Soon, her makeup and hair were both done.

Suddenly, her phone rang.
112111.title: Step out of the shower and dress in something g...

choices: Make the Operative come to you
Both go to the rendevous point
1121112.content:
As you were adjusting the girls clothes onto your new form, a sudden ringing sound rang around the room. You look around the bedroom untill you see a small device flashing and vibrating on the bed. You picked it up off the bed and it told you which button to answer with. 'Ah this must be a human communications device'. You thought to yourself. The caller seemed to be 'Mom xXx'. You quickly tried to alter your speech to human, continuely saying the 'hello' untill it changed to the young humans American teen language. "Hello". You said answering the phone. All of sudden, there was a female voice speaking through the speaker. The only difference was, it was speaking your native tongue. "Whats the password!?!?". It demanded in the alien linguo. "Corkay Ruala". You replied back.

*Alien translated to English*

"Ah, you are another operative, what is your operating number"? Asked the other alien. "TX47, and you?". "TX61. Damn your a higher rank than me, sir". Replied the alien in jelousy. "Don't worry about it, it's 100 mercenaries working on this race, not soliders". You told him. "Good Point". Replied 61. "I think your possessed the body of my hosts daughter". "Yes, and quite a fine find if I am to gloat". You said, admiring your new body a little. "Very nice, same here.". Said 61. "She is beautiful, I found her at a human convienence store. She is what the humans call a 'Milf' I believe". You Chuckled at this. "Did you have any trouble taking her body?". "Well, I think the security camera picked me up but I disabled the system with a sonic ping. Did you have any trouble?". "Not really, just a bump on the head". You replied. "If think we should rendezous friend, in case of any trouble. Two of us are better than one". "Agreed". Said 61. "But where?".
1121112.title: The girl's mother (also possessed)

choices: Someone that knows this girl sees you first
11211122.content:
"Judging by what I've studied so far," you began. "Humans like to meet up in locations where they can spend their currency. Buildings with dozens of stores, or 'malls' as they call them, are one of the most popular locations to rendezvous."

"The 'mall' it is," said 61. "I trust you'll use your GPS to help you find the location?"
"Correct; I need to familiarize myself with these locations, then I won't have a need for it."
"Okay, I'll meet you there. These vehicles humans use to transport themselves are rediculously easy to manage; you being a higher rank then me, should find no trouble piloting one."

TX61 hung up, and you placed the phone back in the girl's purse. Before you went out the door, you browsed her belongings, and then continued to scan her mind. You never knew when information she knew would come in handy. You grabbed her purse, slung it over your shoulder, and got in her car and drove off to the mall.
11211122.title: Both go to the rendevous point

choices: You were beamed up to the ship
112111221.content:
Driving was a breaze with this girls new found memories. You cruised along in the human vehicle, driving along the crowded human streets. The street was still littered with people and the roads bustling with cars. "Wow, this sure is a bustling metropolis". Wait, hang on a second. You were 13 years old in human years and pretty sure they wouldn't talk with such complex words. "Hmm, I may have to re-phrase". You said whilst waiting at the lights. A quick scan of her mind and memories brung you to the sentence again. "Oh my God, there are like soo many people out tonight....perfect". You finished with a wicked smile on your cute face. It didn't take you much longer before you arived at the mall. It was a large building from the outside, littered with human advertising.

Upon walking in, the mall was still lit up with bright lights from the ceiling. There were many, many stores about, each displaying a huge variety of human products in the windows. There was also a mix of humans in the mall, male and female, old and young. The most that struck out though were groups of teenage girls. They were dressed in a very appealing manerism. From what this 13 year olds memories told you, girls usually socialized here. However, time was of the essence and you were looking for your counterpart. Waiting near the centre of the store, another human appraoched you. It was an older female, a blonde in her 20's. She was in some kind of uniform from one of the stores. "Excuse me little girl, are you lost"? The store attendent asked. "Are you TX61"? You replied. "Huh, what does that mean"? The attendent asked, confused by your statement. "I think you'll have to come with me, we'll take you to cutomer service". "Listen earth girl, theres only one place I'd go with you and thats...". You were talking like yourself again. You needed to talk more human. "Oh...erm...sorry. I'm fine, my friends are just buying...clothes." You said, concertrating on what you said. "We're all...like...going to this big party tommorow night".

All of a sudden, someone started ushering you from a hiding spot. "Captain...captain". An older human hissed. "Oh, theres my...mom". You told the attendent. You began to walk over to other human, admiring the attendent as she walked off. 'Hmm, nice ass. Maybe I'll come back for you later'. You met the other agent behind some plants. He had a human body in it's late 30's or possibly early 40's. It was blonde and dressed casually in shirt and jeans. It still even sported slippers. 'Could have made an effort'. You thought. "Captain, TX61 reporting for duty." Said TX61, saluting. "Ok, play it cool TX61. We need to keep undercover. Now where are we beaming from"? "Well, we could enter one of the human changing booths in those stores. It's private in their sir." TX61 responded. "Excellent, lets do it then".

You walked into what looked like a footware store. There were many humans females in here too, some escorting their boyfriends round, who looked rather bored. You and TX61 quickly slipped into the changing rooms and entered one of the booths. "You did remember to bring your technology, didn't you"? You asked. "Yes sir, i stored it in the humans bag". He replied, indicating to the bag slung over the mothers shoulder. "Good, we can't risk humans finding our gadgets". You told him. You then both took out your wrist devices and entered the co-ordinates. A faint beam of blue light appeared around you as you prepared to beam up.
112111221.title: You meet up with TX61

choices: Take one of these two girls.
Continue looking for two civilian bodies for your sub-ordinate and yourself.
11212.content:
You saw her thirteen year old friend show up, and you suddenly received communication from your sub-ordinate.

"Sir, I've received a message from the higher ups. Whichever human you're looking at you take, I am to take one that knows that human."
"Understood."

You looked at Kristina, and then looked at other windows.
11212.title: Her thirteen-year-old friend shows up.

choices: Use one of the three options
11213.content:
You figure that there might be other human female civilians; plenty of them would be possible better candidates than this specimen, Looking to your wrist-mounted device, you decide to index the young female civilians' location for future observations. "Lets' see what else I can find here, A structure this big would definitely contain a wide-variety after all." You move along the side of the building as you search for other humans.
After several hours of observations that lasted into the colonys' night-cycle, you had already created a profile of several female subjects that you were reading over.

Two floors above the first room you've observed was a room belonging to an Elder of sorts, based on your observations of primitive species, Elders are often serving in leadership capacities for small villages and settlements on less-developed worlds; possessing more information of the Civilian castes than the Politician and Celebrity castes in their entirety would claim to know, and in a colony as big as this, an Elder Civilian would hold as much sway in this colony as a Politician Caste member does.

A window to the left of the Elders' belonged to a Healer or Medicine Woman judging from the readings your stealth probe analyzed inside of the room earlier. Where your species failed, Humanity thrived in breeding, this Healer might have the proper equipment necessary to help the species learn to continue on without cloning techniques.

A room on one side of the building was housed by a Matron and her two children, one youth and one newborn. There was a sub-category to your mission overall; a parameter that fell within your interests, Matrons have the ability to proliferate and continue their species, and the scientists wished to study the effectiveness of cross-breeding with Humans to replace what was lost by cloning technology, and to have genetic diversity of one generation to another would also fall within the categories.

There were more female options available in this structure that would fulfill the mission parameters, but you were starting to grow impatient with this inactivity.
11213.title: You move on to the next window.

112131.content: You tap at the side of your enlarged dome as the the old night sky lost some of it's dark luster to fade into a dull Violet of the oncoming sunrise giving you enough time to observe the morning rituals practiced by humanity up close. Unfortunately the time to really appreciate any of the forms or see what they do from the outside perspective has grown short with the upcoming morning bringing traffic that could be problematic for you specifically, a giant headed grey skinned creature on a planet known for, or so at least from the films you've seen, to shoot or try to capture anything extra terrestrial. "Well, the elderly would serve me well in infilitrating some aspects of humanity more soft on the old....but the medicine woman could provide much needed insight on reproduction here on the planet and how it could serve us, but torn info is a little iffy if we don't have practice, and then there is the matron, who I can bring back to the ship and put her off spring in stasis...but then that leaves me to wonder the other two captains are doing?" You mumble to yourself as the small jet back on built into your suit lets out a small burst of heat launching you up in the air to get a better vantage point of the targets...but who to choose?
112131.title: Use one of the three options

1122.content:
You located a city that was full of these higher class civilians, and went to it, hoping to find one for you to bring back. Bringing these humans back won't be easy, so you knew you had to temporarily take over a body of one and use it as escort.

Your mind focused to a building with large lights and a big red carpet. "They must be honoring these higher class civilians," you said to yourself. You looked at each of them, each one more beautiful then the next.
1122.title: A Celebrity

11221.content: So do you take the body of Jessica Alba or somebody else?
11221.title: Jessica Alba

112212.content: So what other human females were in attendence?
112212.title: No, someone else

1122121.content:
As you looked on from above the crowd, you noticed a red carpet guiding into a large building. Human vehicles arrived at the front, dropping off what must have been well known guests. Other humans were held behind barriers as they pointed flashing devices at the well noticed humans. Some of these even took the time to pose. This must have been a high profile human event, and the paparazi were in attendence. "Perfect". You muttered from your high vantage point. "Now, which target to choose". Down below, another car pulled up. Out stepped a beautiful woman, protected by large guards. The paparazi attention quickly turned too her, the bright lights flashing continuesly once again. This woman must definatly have been the most well respected so far. She had beauftiful brown flowing hair, which was dyed with a mix of blonde. She must have been one of the darker vareities of human, as her skin was a sutble shade of brown. It was flawless however, with no clear imperfections, especially on her glwoing, smiling face. She was wearing some kind of low cut, teal coloured dress, which streched down to her knees and showed off a lot of her chest area. There were two large lumps under the dress, which were partly visable. They looked smooth and round. The woman also wore high heeled shoes on her feet.

'Brilliant, she will make an ideal cantidate for 'testing''. You thought. She was heading inside after briefly posing. You touched down behind the car and engaged your cloaking device. You moved behind her and the security guards, carefully treading as to avoid being exposed. Once they entered the building, you noticed the high class event she was attending. There were many other humans chatting and drinking in a large opening room, with human servents moving around with refreshments. The woman and her guards stoped for a momment. She looked a group of other females and gave a strange look of jelousy. She then dispanded her guards and headed off by herself. You kept close to her, following through the crowd and down a hallway, following her into a room with a star symbol on the door. As you quickly snuck in, you noticed she was the only one in the room. There was a small table, with a mirror above and plenty of supplies on the table. This was it, as she sat down on a chair, it was the time to strike. She was looking at the mirror as you disengaged your cloaking device and activated 'the possesser'. You began glowing bright as the atoms of your body broke down into a spirit form. The woman turned around to see the commotion but could only let out the quick scream before your form shot forwards and hit her smack in the mouth.

Everything went dark as you felt yourself gaining control of different part of the body. You began to see light upwards as you steared towards it. With this, you ahve control of the brain and the final push in gaining full control of her body. After what felt like an age, you awoke again, your head spinning and your eyesight blury. 'Urgh, that was strange'. You thought. As you sat up, long brown hair fell across your face. You also felt a jiggle on your chest. These feeling were most definatly 'alien' to you (no pun intended). "This is...new". You said in your alien language. The accent now sounded very different indeed, like a southener (your species knowing the tone after all those red necks got abducted). As you stood up, you fell straight back down again with a thud on your backside. These heels were making you slip. You kicked them off in frustration, so you could stand up. Looking in the mirror, you saw your new body. No longer your simple, small Segelsian form, you were a stunning adult female. "Mmm, prefect". You moaned in your language, admiring your bodies new curves. Looking back to the spot you transported from, you noticed your gadgets on the floor. Scooping them up onto the table, you looked in the now small kit bag and found a tiny pill. You chewed on it for a momment before swallowing it. "Urgh, I hate the way they taste...". You instantly shot your hands up to your mouth. You were now talking clear human. "Ha, I could never get tired of this job". You said in excitment, laughing manically. "Now, who am I"?

You looked around for some sign of identity. Eventually, you found it on a show poster, which you could now clearly read. It said "The MTV music awards 2009: with live preformances from Beyonce Knowles...". You saw the picture of her, well now yourself next to that name. "So I am now this Beyonce figure". You said in a cocky tone. "Well, I can see why she is certainly so well respected". You admired you body again, poking at the lumps beneath your dress. You needed to do something though, as to avoid suspiction by staying in your room to long.

What do you do?
1122121.title: Becoming Beyonce

11221211.content:
After briefly admiring the body, you decided you better get the speciman back to the ship. This Beyonce was obviously very popular at these awards and hanging around could draw unwanted attention. You barely knew the first thing about being human! You quickly and queitly snuck out of your dressing room. You made your way back into the main hall and looked around for a back entrance. Eventually, you saw one of the other side of the hall. Moving your way through the dense crowd, many people gave you a friendly "hello" or "good luck for tonight". You just gave a arkward but convincing smile or "thank you" back. Eventually, you got to the other side of the hall and found a fire exit.

However, before you could escape, another human approached you. "Hey Beyonce, where are you going? Your due to start your set soon". The white female told you. You could only asume she ment the preformance advertised in the poster. "Umm...yea. I'll be back in a second...umm...my tech guy is outside...smoking. And I need to go over a few things with him".

Does she buy your story?
11221211.title: Get the booty out of here

112212111.content:
"Ok then, but tell him to hurry up! They'll be expecting him to set up the lights and effects for your show". "Thanks". You reply, smilling politely. That smile turned into a quiet and slightly evil giggle as you left the building. Indeed, there were people smoking out back. Whether any of them were this Beyonce's 'tech guy', you didn't know. Most of them were just suprised to see your host's body outside. You didn't really care what they though anyway. You suspected they'd probably just smoke their drugs more in order to cure another problem or life shock. You steered your way away from the event and proceded down the deserted back alleys of this human street. The night was cold and you could feel it on your new human body, with various parts exposed by the dress.
Eventually, you found a secluded little spot with no signs of life what so ever. "Ok, time to get this body back to the mothership". You ruffled through your hosts bag and found your wrist device amongst the rest of your gear. The fact that it could slightly shink was an interesting feature. It looked generally smaller even when you brought it back to the orginal size. You activated the device and heard a voice down the intercom. " - Hello? TX47, what is your status"? "This is TX47". You replied in your language, obviously with Beyonce's southern accent still shining through again. "Package is secure, I'm ready for a telo back to deck, if you will". "Well it obviosuly sounds like your human now". The intercom guy said. "And a female I'm guessing, nice one. Ok, ready for telo now, hold still". You hung up and looked to the sky. A small circle of blue light began to swirl around you as it engulfed your host body. With a brief flash, you disapeared from sight.

After a few seconds, you reapeared on the transport deck. You stumbled a little, even thought you wern't wearing those blasted heals anymore. "Ugh, I don't think I'll ever be used to that". You said in a displeased tone. Looking around the hanger, there was no one in sight. 'Where is everyone'? You thought. Well seeing as your only, you might as well take a better look at your new body. In all honesty, you had been itching to do this. The male of your species seemed to have a thing for human women. They were so beautiful and it was just natural. Just as long as it was kept secret from your species' females. Hey, you might be cloners but the reproductive act was still an option in such a large empire. Light years away from hear of course. Anyways, you focused less on thought and let your hands take control. They were slender and femenine, with painted nails and jewelery. You began feeling the curves again, bringing your hands to rest on the half naked lumps on your chest. You gave them a tight squeeze, which made you tingle. However, you heard somebody enter the room. Typicial, ruin your fun.

Who was it?
112212111.title: Making your get away

1122121111.content:
As you were fondling with your, or should that be 'Beyonce's' body, you heard another captain arriving on deck. "Damn, typical. Ruin my fun". You said out loud, bringing your hands back down again. Turning around, you looked to see one of the teleporters was now active. The plasma and electricity crackled and another brief flash shone out. Standing in the teleport dock was another captain.

However, was in a human body or not?
1122121111.title: Another captain teleporting home

11221211111.content: Ok, he was now a human. But which kind of human was he?
11221211111.title: He had a human body

"Sorry, I just said to myself. Bye bye." You lied for break off the conversation and say goodbye to her quickly. But the truth, You hiding in the nearby car for watching 'The Lotus' possess the host.

And then, Lim go to the restroom and encounter 'The Lotus'.

"Monster...arrghmmmmm..." Lim scream when she face the alien, but her scream were muffled as the golden tentacle crawl from 'The Lotus' mouth into her mouth. Her head cocked back violently, sending her hair whipping through the air. Her fingers stretched apart and twitched. 'The Lotus' body disintigrate into the golden goo. Flow with the tentacle into her mouth until empty.

And then, Lim is collapse to the floor and convulse for a long time. After 2 minutes, She stopped and open her eyes.

"Okay, This body is not bad." 'Lim Ju-eun' 's eyes is glowing gold. 'The Lotus' control her body now.

'Lim Ju-eun' leave the restroom and visit you. "TX47, Your mission is complete. Go to help the other ministers now."

"Roger that." You replied and open the device to find the next mission.
